"Make each day count by putting your health first" ​

New to Tampax? Watch how girls talk about their using experience ​

Description:

There's a lot of tampon myths out there, and we know you have questions! OB/GYN Dr. Nicole Sparks and actress & executive producer Marsai Martin are giving us the answers to your most asked period questions.

Can a tampon protect as well as a pad? Like pads, tampons can provide up to 100% leak-free protection Do tampons hurt? When inserted correctly, you shouldn't feel it.

Description

Ready to talk periods? There's a lot of tampon myths out there, so let's set the record straight. College basketball players Angel Reese and Flau'jae Johnson get real about why tampons are a must for them, on and off the court.
No see, no feel protection. For a better way to period, just add Tampax!
